'''Isembold Took''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Isembold was the fifth child of [[Gerontius Took]] and [[Adamanta Chubb]]. He had many descendants, and died in {{SR|1346}}.<ref>{{App|Took}}</ref>
==Etymology==
The name contains ''isen'' "iron" and ''bold'' "bold".<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>
